item.title: 月亮遮住太阳能电池板，日食将使美国太阳能发电量减少 30 千兆瓦
item.description: 在周一的日全食期间，美国将损失超过 30 千兆瓦的太阳能，大约相当于 30 个核反应堆的发电量。【原文：The US will lose more than 30 gigawatts of solar energy during Monday’s total eclipse — roughly the output of 30 nuclear reactors — as sunlight is blocked during prime generating hours.】

item.title: 俄罗斯第一季度收入因油价上涨而大幅增长
item.description: 俄罗斯第一季度财政收入大幅增长，部分原因是一次性税收支付和油价上涨，该国继续经受住因乌克兰战争而受到的制裁。【原文：Russia reported a sharp increase in revenue in the first quarter due in part to one-time tax payments and rising oil prices as the country continues to weather sanctions over its war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 华尔街将欧洲视为股市下一轮反弹的赢家
item.description: 华尔街的策略师们推荐欧洲股票而非美国股票，因为经济前景的改善和接近历史记录的折扣推动了科技行业以外的收益。【原文：Wall Street strategists are recommending European equities over their US peers as an improving economic outlook and near-record discounts drive gains beyond the technology industry.】

item.title: 维托尔公司第二年盈利130亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，维托尔集团 2023 年的利润约为 130 亿美元，这标志着全球最大的独立石油贸易商连续第二年实现盈利丰收。【原文：Vitol Group posted a profit of about $13 billion for 2023, according to a person familiar with the matter, marking the second consecutive year of bumper earnings for the world’s biggest independent oil trader.】

item.title: 尼日利亚前中央银行行长对新指控认罪
item.description: 尼日利亚前中央银行行长戈德温-埃梅菲勒（Godwin Emefiele）周一对该国一家金融监督机构对他提出的新的外币违规指控表示不认罪。【原文：Former Central Bank of Nigeria Governor Godwin Emefiele pleaded not guilty Monday to new allegations of foreign-currency infractions brought against him by one of the country’s finance watchdogs.】

item.title: 苏黎世保险将停止承保新的化石燃料风险
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团股份公司将不再承保新的石油和天然气项目，并正在打击计划扩大冶金煤矿开采的客户。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG will no longer underwrite new oil and gas projects, and is cracking down on clients planning to expand in metallurgical coal mining.】

item.title: 前货运经纪人为何在墨西哥下重注
item.description:
美墨贸易能增长多少？【原文：

How much can US-Mexico trade grow?

】

item.title: 欧洲央行称欧元区企业预期工资增长将放缓
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的一项民意调查显示，欧元区的公司预计工资增长将放缓，这让政策制定者稍感欣慰，因为通胀已安全回落。【原文：Companies in the euro area expect wage growth to slow, according to a poll by the European Central Bank, offering policymakers some comfort that inflation is safely in retreat.】

item.title: 德国房地产市场低迷加剧，投资交易下降 19
item.description: 根据仲量联行的数据，今年年初，投资者对德国房地产交易的兴趣依然不高，即使一些估值看起来已经触底，降息的脚步也越来越近。【原文：Investor appetite for German real estate deals remained muted at the start of the year, according to Jones Lang Lasalle, even as some valuations look to be bottoming out and interest-rate cuts edge closer.】

item.title: 交易员倾向于美联储在 2024 年降息两个季度
item.description: 交易员们对美联储今年降息三次（每次四分之一个点）的信心正在迅速消退，现在市场只倾向于降息两次。【原文：Traders’ conviction on three quarter-point interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve this year is quickly dissipating, with markets now favoring just two reductions.】

item.title: 阿布扎比的 Lunate 和沙特集团买下迪拜标志性大厦
item.description: 阿布扎比的一家投资公司和沙特的一家企业集团买下了迪拜金融中心最大的写字楼，在全球为数不多的乐观商业地产市场中分得一杯羹。【原文：An Abu Dhabi investment firm and a Saudi conglomerate have bought into the largest office tower in Dubai’s financial hub, securing a slice of one of the world’s few upbeat commercial property markets.】

item.title: 通胀持续袭来，99 美分专卖店宣告破产
item.description: 99 Cents Only Stores LLC 在 4 月份宣布计划结束业务运营后，已申请破产。【原文：99 Cents Only Stores LLC has filed for bankruptcy after announcing plans in April to wind down its business operations.】

item.title: 菲律宾通胀加剧，比索走软，但仍维持利率不变
item.description: 在通胀回升和比索近期下跌的背景下，菲律宾中央银行将基准利率维持在 17 年来的高位不变。【原文：The Philippine central bank kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged at a 17-year high amid resurgent inflation and recent decline in the peso.】

item.title: 尼日利亚证券交易所购买埃塞俄比亚证券交易所 5%的股份
item.description: 尼日利亚交易所集团（Nigerian Exchange Group Plc）收购了埃塞俄比亚证券交易所（Ethiopian Securities Exchange）5% 的股份，以拓展东非乃至整个非洲大陆的资本市场活动。【原文：Nigerian Exchange Group Plc acquired a 5% shareholding in Ethiopian Securities Exchange as it seeks to expand capital-market activities in East Africa and across the continent.】

item.title: 战争给经济前景蒙上阴影，以色列面临艰难的利率抉择
item.description: 以色列央行将于周一密切关注利率走势，分析师几乎各持己见，有人预测以色列央行将降息以提振饱受战争破坏的经济，也有人认为货币当局将保持政策稳定以保护谢克尔。【原文：The Bank of Israel is set for a close interest-rate call on Monday, with analysts almost evenly split between those predicting a cut to boost the war-damaged economy and those seeing monetary authorities keeping policy steady to protect the shekel.】

item.title: 埃及希望购买更多液化天然气以避免夏季停电
item.description: 埃及希望在未来四个月内购买更多液化天然气，以避免重蹈去年长期停电的覆辙。【原文：Egypt aims to buy more liquefied natural gas shipments over the next four months as the nation aims to avoid a repeat of last year’s chronic blackouts.】

item.title: 劳力士首席执行官称将手表与股票相提并论很危险
item.description: 劳力士公司（Rolex SA）负责人表示，在大流行病期间投机者的兴趣激增之后，将奢侈手表视为投资是危险的。【原文：The head of Rolex SA said viewing luxury watches as investments is dangerous following a surge in interest from speculators during the pandemic.】

item.title: 耶伦威胁制裁援助俄罗斯战争的中国银行
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）结束了在中国为期四天的会谈，并向中国的银行和出口商发出警告：如果你们帮助加强俄罗斯的军事能力，华盛顿就会找你们算账。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen wrapped up four days of talks in China with a warning to the country’s banks and exporters: If you help bolster Russia’s military capacity, Washington will come after you.】

item.title: 国际原子能机构称无人机袭击了被占领的扎波罗热核电站
item.description: 联合国原子能机构称，无人机自2022年11月以来首次袭击了俄罗斯占领的扎波罗热核电站，其中一架在反应堆附近爆炸。【原文：Drones attacked the Russian-occupied Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant for the first time since November 2022, with one exploding near a reactor building, the United Nation’s atomic agency said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚锂矿商 Azure 批准 Rinehart-SQM 收购案
item.description: Azure Minerals Ltd.的股东批准了亿万富翁吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）的私人公司汉考克勘探有限公司（Hancock Prospecting Pty Ltd.）和合作伙伴智利矿业公司（Sociedad Química y Minera de Chile）对这家澳大利亚锂矿公司的收购。【原文：Shareholders in Azure Minerals Ltd. have approved the Australian lithium miner’s takeover by billionaire Gina Rinehart’s private company Hancock Prospecting Pty Ltd. and partner Sociedad Química y Minera de Chile.】

item.title: 现代造船公司寻求自 2022 年以来韩国最大规模的首次公开募股
item.description: 一家维修和管理船舶的公司启动了两年来韩国最大的首次公开募股，分析师认为强劲的收入增长是其主要吸引力。【原文：A company that repairs and manages ships kicked off what’s poised to be South Korea’s biggest initial public offering in two years, with analysts citing strong revenue growth a key attraction.】

item.title: 前资深银行家帕萨利德斯将领导塞浦路斯中央银行
item.description: 塞浦路斯总统办公室发表声明称，前银行高管克里斯托多洛斯-帕萨利德斯（Christodoulos Patsalides）将接替康斯坦丁诺斯-希罗多托（Constantinos Herodotou）担任塞浦路斯央行行长。【原文：Former banking executive Christodoulos Patsalides will replace Constantinos Herodotou as governor of Cyprus’s central bank, according to a statement from the Cyprus President’s office.】

item.title: 德国工业生产增长，进一步释放转机信号
item.description: 德国工业生产连续第二个月增长，使人们更加希望这个欧洲最大的经济体可能很快摆脱过去六个月可能出现的浅度衰退。【原文：German industrial production increased for a second month, underpinning hopes that Europe’s biggest economy may soon emerge from a shallow recession it probably witnessed in the last six months.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
日元疲软，日本盈亏平衡通胀创历史新高
item.description: 投资者对日本通胀的预期创下历史新高，因为日元疲软使生活成本面临上涨压力。【原文：A gauge for investor expectations of Japan’s inflation matched a record high as a weak yen keeps upward pressure on the cost of living.】

item.title: 中国假日消费增长显示消费复苏步入正轨
item.description: 自大流行病爆发以来，中国游客的单次假日消费首次超过 2019 年，这也表明世界第二大经济体的消费正在复苏。【原文：Chinese tourists spent more per trip over a holiday than in 2019 for the first time since the pandemic started, adding to signs that consumption is recovering in the world’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: 墨西哥候选人在首场辩论中因提案不足而争吵不休
item.description: 墨西哥总统候选人在 2024 年竞选的首场辩论中互相攻击，试图诋毁对方，同时对解决腐败、教育和卫生等问题的建议细节避而不谈。【原文：Mexico’s presidential candidates traded attacks and attempted to discredit each other in the first debate of the 2024 race, while going light on details of proposals to address corruption, education and health.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 英国就业市场对应届毕业生的要求越来越高
item.description: 英国大学毕业生的工作岗位正在以两倍于劳动力市场其他地区的速度减少，这引发了人们对企业没有为未来劳动力投入足够资金的担忧。【原文：Jobs for Britain’s university graduates are drying up at double the pace of the rest of the labor market, spurring concerns that businesses aren’t investing enough in their future workforces.】

item.title: 台积电推动台湾股市跑赢技术竞争对手韩国股市
item.description: 台湾的股市已经超越了科技竞争对手韩国的股市，因为这两个市场正在争夺一些全球最大的基金经理的人工智能投资。【原文：Taiwan’s stock market has trounced that of tech rival South Korea as the two markets compete for artificial intelligence investment from some of the world’s biggest money managers.】
